item.description:
What:   Pig N pepper fest is a yearly fundraising event put on by the Westford Rotary Club. 

           There will be live music, amateur Tailgate contests, craft tables & vendors, carnival

           games, Hot air Baloon rides, Taste of Summer food pavilion, farmers market and

           everyone's favorite...the petting zoo.

Where:  Meet at the restrooms that abut the ski lodge in the parking lot.  We will wait 15

             minutes after the meeting time.

 

What to bring:   dress appropriately for the weather, and a camera for taking great shots of your friends to be used at a later time.  Don't forget to bring the meetup cellphone number (978-304-2811) in case you get lost, are running late or can not locate us.

 

Please remember:   Weather may cancel this event.  If you haven't paid your dues this year yet, please remember to either pay online or at this event.

Hope to see you at Nashoba

Donna & Janet
item.how_to_find_us: By the restrooms in the parking lot
item.name: Pig N Pepper Fest
